story.title: From Dog Love to Mission
story.subtitle: Founding Paws emerged from our deep connection to our dogs Nala and Jackson. When we searched for premium supplements that are scientifically proven AND made with love, we found nothing – so we created it ourselves.
story.philosophy_text_1: Every dog deserves a long, healthy life. But the market was full of products with questionable ingredients, non-transparent processes, and empty promises.
story.philosophy_text_2: That's why we work with leading veterinarians and manufacture our supplements in a small facility in Heilbronn – with the highest care, traceable ingredients, and genuine attention to detail.
story.philosophy_quote: Science meets heart. That's Founding Paws.
